sentences.sContent: Jack is an ambidextrous hitter; he can bat right - handed or left - handed.
sentences.sContent_eng: Jack is an ambidextrous hitter; he can bat right - handed or left - handed.
sentences.sCn: 杰克是一位双手都很灵巧的打击手； 他可以用右手或左手打击。

sentences.sContent: Not so for 24 year-old Chen Siyuan, an ambidextrous translator from northern China.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not so for 24 year-old Chen Siyuan, an ambidextrous translator from northern China.
sentences.sCn: 不过这名24 岁，双手灵巧的翻译陈思远可是例外。

sentences.sContent: Attempt to be ambidextrous--even children who are left-handed in these cultures are taught to eat with their right hand--or at least explain yourself to your fellow diners before plunging in.
sentences.sContent_eng: Attempt to be ambidextrous--even children who are left-handed in these cultures are taught to eat with their right hand--or at least explain yourself to your fellow diners before plunging in.
sentences.sCn: 还是努力让自己的双手都灵巧吧——在这些文化里，即使是左撇子的孩子也被教会用右手吃饭——或者至少吃饭前向同伴解释一下。

remMethod.val: ambi(两个) + dextr(右的) + ous → 两只手都像右手一样灵巧 → 十分灵巧的

words.tran: 怀二心；两手俱技巧独特；双手皆灵巧的本领或状态；两面派手法

trans.tranOther: able to use either hand equally well
